properties.areaDesc: McDonald, MO; Newton, MO; Lawrence, MO; Barry, MO
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 1:10AM CST until January 18 at 1:15PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Newton County in southwestern Missouri...
McDonald County in southwestern Missouri...
Barry County in southwestern Missouri...
Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri...

* Until 115 PM CST Saturday.

* At 108 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain that will cause
flooding. Up to one and a half inches of widespread rain has has
already fallen. Some additional rain can be expected through the
night.

* Creeks, streams, and low water crossings will be especially
susceptible to the dangers of flooding.
Locations in the warning include...
Southern Joplin...                Neosho...
Roaring River State Park...       Big Sugar Creek State Park...
Monett...                         Aurora...
Mount Vernon...                   Cassville...
Seneca...                         Marionville...
Granby...                         Anderson...
Noel...                           Duquesne...
Dodge...                          Shell Knob...
Pierce City...                    Goodman...
Purdy...                          South West City...

This warning includes but is not limited to the following low water
crossings...
Highway C at Indian Creen northeast of Anderson...
Highway 97 at The Spring River north of Stotts City...
Route C at Flat Creek north of Cassville...
and Route C just south of Mcdowell.
properties.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
